de.tub.reader
Class ReaderFactory

java.lang.Object
  de.tub.reader.AbstractReaderFactory
      de.tub.reader.ReaderFactory

public class ReaderFactory
extends AbstractReaderFactory

This class is an implementation of a Reader Factory. It is part of the Abstract Factory design pattern. Because there is only one ReaderFactory per application this class is implemented using the Singleton design pattern.

Author:
Sebastian Oelke
